name: EditSessionRecording
description:
Update specific details of a session recording.

Use this tool to modify attributes of a session recording by specifying the project and recording IDs. Ideal for updating incomplete data or correcting entries.

parameters.name: session_recording_id
parameters.description: A UUID string used to uniquely identify the session recording to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve it via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: session_recording_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing fields to update a session recording, such as viewed status, duration, activity metrics, etc.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
